links: https://books.google.co.uk/books?id=wRioAQAAQBAJ&pg=PA72&dq="Reached the end of the queue"&hl=en&sa=X&redir_esc=y#v=onepage&q="Reached the end of the queue"&f=false
citation.title: The Almost Nearly Perfect People

q&a.title: What do you ask when you want to join a queue?
q&a.summary:
If you are wanting to join a long queue what do you ask the person at the back?


"Is this the start of the queue?"
"Is this the end of the queue?"


Consider people at the supermarket counter. Is the start of the queue the place you go to start queuing?
